toolSpec.name: financial_volume_profile
toolSpec.description: Retrieves Volume Profile structure (POC, VAH, VAL, Nodes) for default granular timeframes (1m, 5m). Useful for identifying key support and resistance levels based on volume distribution.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., SPY, AAPL).

toolSpec.name: financial_technical_analysis
toolSpec.description: Retrieves standard Technical Analysis indicator values (e.g., SMA, RSI, MACD, ATR, VWAP) for default granular timeframes (1m, 5m, 1d). Useful for assessing trend, momentum, and volatility.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., SPY, AAPL).

toolSpec.name: financial_technical_zones
toolSpec.description: Retrieves calculated high-probability support and resistance price zones derived from methods like Volume Profile and volatility extensions for default granular timeframes (1m, 5m). Useful for identifying precise entry, exit, and stop-loss levels.

symbol.description: The stock ticker symbol (e.g., SPY, AAPL).
